rules_text: You get {E}{E}{E}{E}, then you may pay any amount of {E}. Return each creature with toughness less than or equal to the amount of {E} paid this way to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
[i]“Why do you turn your head to the sky when you hear thunder? [/i]I [i]am the coming storm.”
—Rhey Linsey[/i]
